Comments_List: Basic film writing and working with actors. How to analyze script, organize the shooting of small-scale scenes, and execution/editing.
Shooting scenes on weekends is huge time commitment and tough to find people willing to help. Group projects are more manageable and helps to rotate positions.
Definitely, as long as they are seriously interested in learning about the making of film.
If you want to do film you should take this class. It is a lot of work but Sandra is great.
